title: Creative Writing Workshop: Word and Image
description:
Two Thursdays, September 27 and October 4

The museum galleries are a natural inspiration for storytellers, poets, and scribblers of all kinds. Experience a series of encounters with artworks and generative exercises designed to refine your eye for detail, engage your storytelling instincts, and enhance your toolkit for written expression.

Participants should bring their own journal or favorite blank book. Pencils will be provided by the museum.

Click here to see all upcoming sketch classes and workshops. For additional information, please call (312) 443-3680 or email museum-programs@artic.edu.

To request an accessibility accommodation for an Art Institute program, please call (312) 443-3680 or send an email to access@artic.edu as far in advance as possible.

Please see the museum’s Accessibility page for more information.
buy_button_caption:
$45 members, $55 nonmembers
Classes are recommended for ages 16 and up.
